item.title: High-Dimensional Probability and Statistics II
item.description: This file is for the notes and exercises for the book Roman Vershynin’s High-Dimensional Probability, one of the references used in Prof Lunde’s Math5440. The other references are Ramon van Handel’s Probability in High Dimension and Martin J.Wainwright’s High-Dimensional Statistics. Errata and update of HDP: errata, update. Exercises solns for HDP: soln. Exercises solns for HDS: soln. 3. Random Vectors in High Dimensions

item.title: High-Dimensional Probability and Statistics I
item.description: This file is for the notes and exercises for the book Roman Vershynin’s High-Dimensional Probability, one of the references used in Prof Lunde’s Math5440. The other references are Ramon van Handel’s Probability in High Dimension and Martin J.Wainwright’s High-Dimensional Statistics. Errata and update of HDP: errata, update. Exercises solns for HDP: soln. Exercises solns for HDS: soln. 0. Appetizer Key Takeaways convex combination $\sum_{i=1}^m \lambda_i z_i \quad$ where $\quad \lambda_i \geq 0 \quad$ and $\quad \sum_{i=1}^m \lambda_i=1$.
